name: Voyage into the Abyss
description:
Stranded in space, hack bombs to collect fuel, to survive as long as possible.

Dodge/ Shoot meteoroids to gain Crystals

Press and Hold Green Fuel Pod To Recharge and Refuel Ship.

-=Controls=-

A and D to turn Left and Right

W to move forward

E to Hack/ Pick up Objects

SPACE  to shoot.
